sentences.en: A slow, reminiscent smile spread over her face.
sentences.cn: 怀旧的微笑慢慢浮现在她脸上。

sentences.en: a style strongly reminiscent of Virginia Woolf’s novels
sentences.cn: 一种酷似弗吉尼娅·吴尔夫小说的风格

sentences.en: Doane warmed up and became reminiscent.
sentences.cn: 多恩激动起来,谈到往事.

sentences.en: Her face wore a reminiscent smile.
sentences.cn: 她面带微笑，沉浸在往事之中。

sentences.en: Her writing style was reminiscent of ancient classical writers.
sentences.cn: 她的写作风格使人联想到古代的古典作家.

sentences.en: His style is reminiscent of Picasso's.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术风格很像毕加索的.

sentences.en: His style of painting is reminiscent of Da Vinci's.
sentences.cn: 他的绘画风格像达·芬奇.

sentences.en: His writings were reminiscent of ancient classical writers.
sentences.cn: 他的作品很像古代的古典作家.

sentences.en: I don't know why I am in such a reminiscent mood.
It is a magnificent wine with a soft voluptuousness more reminiscent of old-fashioned burgundy.
sentences.cn: 这是一种很棒的葡萄酒，温和醇厚，更像传统的勃艮第葡萄酒。

sentences.en: It was reminiscent of his presidential campaigns.
sentences.cn: 这使他联想起他参加总统竞选的情景.

sentences.en: She bowed her head in a gesture somehow reminiscent of royalty.
sentences.cn: 她低头的姿势让人想起皇室风范。

sentences.en: The atmosphere was reminiscent of spy movies.
sentences.cn: 那气氛使人联想起间谍电影.

sentences.en: The decor was reminiscent of a municipal arts-and-leisure centre.
sentences.cn: 这种布置让人想起都市里的艺术休闲中心。

sentences.en: The vast volcanic slope was eerily reminiscent of a lunar landscape.
sentences.cn: 开阔的火山坡让人心生怪异地联想起月球的地貌。

sentences.en: There was a sweetish smell, vaguely reminiscent of coffee.
sentences.cn: 有一股甜丝丝的气味, 使人隐隐觉得像是咖啡.

words.tran_cn: 回忆；怀旧；引起联想的相似事物
怀旧的，回忆往事的；耽于回想的

trans.tran_cn: 怀旧的，回忆往事的，使人联想…的
